alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 01 at 4:33AM EDT until May 02 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to as much as 9 inches, greatest over the highest terrain. North to northwest winds gusting as high as 50 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult due to slushy snow accumulations on roads. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes today. With the heavy, wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, the strong winds will cause tree damage and power outages. The snow will also be difficult to move.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
